summary: This document is a financial statement from Deutsche Bank Trust Company detailing account balances and transactions for the period from May 1, 2015, to May 31, 2015. It includes information on deposits, withdrawals, service charges, and interest payments, highlighting significant transactions such as a $250,000 transfer of funds.

persons.name: Mande Kirby
persons.context: Mande Kirby is mentioned as the contact person for personal assistance regarding the account.

events.title: Transfer of Funds
events.description: A transfer of $250,000 was made from the account.

events.title: Interest Payment
events.description: An interest payment of $59,818.93 was credited to the account.

locations: 6100 Red Book Quarter B3, St Thomas 00802, United States
keyFacts: The account had a beginning balance of $576,970,072.55 on May 1, 2015.
The ending balance as of May 31, 2015, was $576,970,072.55 after accounting for transactions.
A total of $50.00 was charged in service fees during the statement period.
The document indicates a total of $250,000.00 was transferred out of the account on May 15, 2015.
Interest earned during this period was $59,818.93.
